channel.title: Stranger Foods
channel.description: A catalogue of recipes Tom has made.

item.title: Spiced apple cake
item.description:
Spiced apple cake



This can either be eaten as it is, slightly warm or at room temperature, or served as a dessert with a scoop of vanilla ice cream. This cake should be eaten on the day it is baked, or the day after – stored in an airtight container to keep it at its best.

item.title: Gnocchi with mushroom-lentil ragu
item.description:
Gnocchi with mushroom-lentil ragu



This hearty veg-packed ragu contains mushrooms and soy sauce for an almost meaty, umami flavour

item.title: Peruvian-style grilled-chicken sandwiches with spicy green sauce recipe
item.description: Peruvian-style grilled-chicken sandwiches with spicy green sauce recipe

item.title: Tessa’s spice cake
item.description:
Tessa’s spice cake



This is a simple spiced pound cake, but one that is seriously moist, with a lovely fine crumb. There’s enough going on, spice-wise, that we’ve restrained ourselves when it comes to an icing and left it unadorned.

item.title: Chicken shawarma pie
item.description:
Chicken shawarma pie



Spiced marinated chicken thighs, slow-cooked until meltingly tender, layered with baked potato slices and rich tahini sauce, all wrapped up in thin-as-a-feather butter-brushed filo.
